entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inuvik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -37.7°C
